00124 /************************** GLOBAL/PUBLIC MACRO DEFINITIONS *********************************/
00125 
00126 #ifdef  DEBUG
00127 /*******************************************************************************
00128 * @brief                The CHECK_PARAM macro is used for function's parameters check.
00129 *                               It is used only if the library is compiled in DEBUG mode.
00130 * @param[in]    expr - If expr is false, it calls check_failed() function
00131 *                       which reports the name of the source file and the source
00132 *                       line number of the call that failed.
00133 *                    - If expr is true, it returns no value.
00134 * @return               None
00135 *******************************************************************************/
00136 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr) ((expr) ? (void)0 : check_failed((uint8_t *)__FILE__, __LINE__))
00137 #else
00138 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr)
00139 #endif /* DEBUG */
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143 /************************** GLOBAL/PUBLIC FUNCTION DECLARATION *********************************/
00144 
00145 #ifdef  DEBUG
00146 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line);
00147 #endif
00148 
00149 
00150 #endif /* LPC17XX_LIBCFG_H_ */
